landing_about_p1: Akoub Agricultural Services works to connect modern technology with agriculture.
landing_about_spec1: Palm tree pollination and organic fertilizer spraying using agricultural technology, AI, and drone data analysis.
landing_about_spec2: Disease detection and soil moisture measurement.
landing_about_spec3: Early detection of the red palm weevil, one of the most harmful pests to palm farms, using drones.
landing_about_spec4: Marketplace for trading dates and organic products.
landing_service_dates_desc: An integrated digital marketplace connecting date producers and buyers to facilitate secure and transparent trading.
landing_service_1_desc: A model to track the process of palm pollination and pesticide spraying to ensure pollination quality and completion of spraying operations.
landing_service_2_desc: The drone is equipped with an AI camera sensor that uses computer vision to detect and count targeted trees.
landing_service_3_desc: Control of palm pests - Early detection of red palm weevil - Spraying of field crops and fruit trees.
landing_vision_text: Empowering and supporting the agricultural community to keep pace with global technology with the highest quality standards through our digital platform, diverse services, and improving the quality of dates.
landing_goals_text: Our goal is to integrate artificial intelligence technology into the agricultural industry to motivate farmers to care for their farms themselves with the highest possible quality. AI models will also help in the early detection of diseases and making the right decision if any problem exists. We look forward to completing all our services in order to achieve high efficiency in agricultural operations.
landing_footer_copyright: © 2024 Akoub-agri. Designed & Developed by Your Team.
